cleanup.desc: remove both created env and soft entries

deploy.desc: install the necessary plugin (oprimizer or ansatz) and the corresponding environment for the 'run' method to work

plugin_path.desc: provide the path to the plugin's editable python file

run.desc: run several repetitions and record the results

upload.desc: upload the best experimental results on the server for visualization and comparison

copyright: See CK COPYRIGHT.txt for copyright details
desc: simplify running the vqe pipeline and recording the results
